attributes.action: We ask that parliament holds a vote on whether Britain should exit the EU.
attributes.background: We ask that the government does not invoke Article 50 following the advisory, non-binding EU referendum vote of 23rd June 2016. We ask instead that the issue of whether Britian should leave the EU is debated and voted upon in parliament.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
